data.title: Still Fun!
data.text: It's hard to believe a place like this still exists in Marin, but there it is. In addition to billiards, there's a ping-pong table upstairs, and the place's slightly funky feel isn't uncomfortable for families or date night.

data.title: IT BEGINS WITH "P" AND RHYMES WITH COOL
data.text: I continue to be fascinated with the beauty of this game  Fortunately for me and for lovers of pocket billiards the perfect hall awaits in mid-town San Rafael.  It's an all-age, family-oriented spot. Serious players and just-for-fun players go. Moms and Dads take their kids.  There's food available, beer, music..and ping pong!. With two floors of tables it's a pool leaguer's haven.. So if you're visiting and want to entertain friends or family; stage a birthday party  or just play a while, there's no place like it north of the Golden Gate.  We hear that Classic is soon to be a mecca for table and billiard equipment.  Phone:----------
